localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Hey you! Yes, you! You're part of the Product Hunt community! Whether you are making those great products, hunting the amazing ones, upvoting the ones you especially love, or just dicussing them - see how you impacted PH this year with ProductHunt Wrapped!
blogPost.body: Hey you! Yes, you! You're part of the Product Hunt community! Whether you are making those great products, hunting the amazing ones, upvoting the ones you especially love, or just dicussing them - see how you impacted PH this year with ProductHunt Wrapped!
blogPost.title: ProductHunt Wrapped - Maker or Hunter see how you added to the PH community!
blogPost.author: Tim Carambat

localize.description: 嘿，你！是的，就是你！您是产品猎头社区的一员！无论你是在制作那些伟大的产品，寻找令人惊叹的产品，还是提升你特别喜欢的产品，还是只是在讨论它们-看看你今年在ProductHunt的包装下对PH产生了怎样的影响！
localize.tagline: 制造者或猎人，看看你是如何加入PH社区的！

localize.description: 嘿，你！是的，就是你！您是產品獵頭社區的一員！無論你是在製作那些偉大的產品，尋找令人驚歎的產品，還是提升你特別喜歡的產品，還是隻是在討論它們-看看你今年在ProductHunt的包裝下對PH產生了怎樣的影響！
localize.tagline: 製造者或獵人，看看你是如何加入PH社區的！

previous.title: Nice to see the little guys win... https://t.co/Tn8qIqKNI1

localize.full_text: 很高兴看到小家伙们赢了......https://t.co/Tn8qIqKNI1。
很高興看到小傢伙們贏了......https://t.co/Tn8qIqKNI1。

next.excerpt: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!
next.title: Wondercall 2.0 - Add video call and scheduler into any service in seconds

localize.description: 在一眨眼的功夫，就能将视频通话和调度功能融入到您的服务中。Wondercall 2.0是更强大的嵌入式视频通话系统的任何网站和应用程序。现在，您不仅可以拨打电话，还可以安排他们。和方式来检查所有参与
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将视频呼叫和调度程序添加到任何服务中。

localize.description: 在一眨眼的功夫，就能將視頻通話和調度功能融入到您的服務中。Wondercall 2.0是更強大的嵌入式視頻通話系統的任何網站和應用程序。現在，您不僅可以撥打電話，還可以安排他們。和方式來檢查所有參與
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將視頻呼叫和調度程序添加到任何服務中。
